Led by visionary founders Jane Doe (Creative Director), John Smith (Lead Planner), and Emily Johnson (Marketing Director), we're passionate about crafting unforgettable wedding experiences and creating memories that last a lifetime. Together, we're committed to excellence and creativity in the world of wedding ceremonies. pages.privacy-policy: EverAfter - Privacy Policy EverAfter HOME ABOUT US services Contact Privacy Policy **EverAfter respects your privacy and is committed to protecting your personal information.** This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and store your information when you use our website. Information We Collect We may collect two types of information from you: **Personal Information:** This is information that can be used to identify you directly, such as your name, email address, phone number, and wedding planning details (if provided). **Non-Personal Information:** This is information that does not identify you directly, such as browsing data, technical information collected from your device, and usage statistics. How We Use Your Information We use the information we collect for the following purposes: To provide and improve our services, including responding to your inquiries and requests. To personalize your experience on our website. To send you important information about our website, such as changes to our terms and conditions. For internal purposes, such as data analysis and fraud prevention. Sharing Your Information We may share your information with third-party service providers who perform services on our behalf, such as web hosting and data analysis. These providers are obligated to protect your information and only use it for the purposes we specify. We may also disclose your information if required by law or in the good faith belief that such action is necessary to protect our rights or the safety of others. Your Choices You have choices about how we use your information. You can: Opt out of receiving marketing emails from us. Request access to or deletion of your personal information. Security We take reasonable steps to protect your information from unauthorized access, disclosure, alteration, or destruction. However, no website is completely secure, and we cannot guarantee the security of your information. Changes to this Privacy Policy We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will post any changes on this page and encourage you to review it periodically. The EverAfter website uses cookies to ensure you have the best experience on our site. Accept or Decline. pages.terms-conditions: EverAfter - Terms and Conditions EverAfter HOME ABOUT US services Contact Terms and Conditions Welcome to EverAfter. These terms and conditions outline the rules and regulations for the use of EverAfter's website and services. 1. Agreement to Terms By accessing this website or using our services, you agree to be bound by these terms and conditions. If you disagree with any part of these terms and conditions, you must not use our website or services. 2. User Content Our website allows you to post, link, store, share, and otherwise make available certain information, text, graphics, videos, or other material. You are responsible for the content you post on our website and must ensure that it complies with our community guidelines. 3. Privacy Policy Your use of our website and services is also governed by our Privacy Policy. Please review our Privacy Policy to understand how we collect, use, and protect your personal information. 4. Changes to Terms We reserve the right to update or change our terms and conditions at any time. It is your responsibility to check our website periodically for changes. Your continued use of our website or services after we post any modifications to the terms and conditions constitutes acceptance of those changes.
